attributes.action: Make the painted Ukraine flag a permanent feature of Notting Hill Gate
attributes.additional_details: If this can not be made a permanent feature, it should at least be professionally painted as a month long celebration of the Ukraine people.
attributes.background:
Led by Donkeys recently painted the road outside the Russian embassy in bright stripes of blue and yellow.
To show the UK’s strong support for the people of Ukraine, the government and the City of London should support making this painted Ukraine flag a permanent feature of Notting Hill Gate.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

This would be a matter for the local traffic authority, not the Government or Parliament.
